about_the_game:
Battle Heroine Crisis

Character DLC 2nd release!

Heroine Pack 2: Ticy & Elizabeth Another


2 new heroine stories have appeared!
- Experience the newly composed story and colorful exciting situation firsthand!
- This package contains the story of 2 heroines [Ticy Phenyl / Elizabeth Mabley: Another].

The flow of the game
- Requires Battle Heroine Crisis to play this DLC.
- You can enjoy a new character & scenario, [Ticy Phenyl / Elizabeth Mabley: Another].
- If you have cleared all character scenarios in the main part, you can enjoy the DLC character scenarios in order.
- Players can build and enhance their own card deck according to the scenario.
- Many new cards with new functions that were not in the main game have been added to this additional character.
New Action Cards: 1 type
New event cards: 3 types
- New heroine comes with new graphics and Japanese voice.
- Card decks that have cleared this DLC can be used additionally in the challenge mode [Ganessa's Challenge].
Break through the barriers of Challenge Mode with a new card strategy!

Take on the challenge of a new experience unfolded by 2 attractive additional heroines!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content that is not suitable for all ages or may be inappropriate for use at work: nudity or sexually suggestive content, or general adult content. 

This game content includes a description that allows some viewers to feel that characters who manipulate sadistic content and mind induce permission for sexual activity.

All characters related to this game content are over 18 years old.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7 SP1 / WIN8 / WIN10 / XP
  • Processor: Windows7 SP1 / WIN8 / WIN10 / XP
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphic card
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

short_description: A beautiful heroine [Pandora] who fights an unknown enemy that threatens mankind.BHC's additional character DLC, a unique encounter and battle with Pandora, appears!Experience two new and exciting episodes!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
